attributes.action: Make it compulsory to fly the flag of the home nation or the union flag on every flag pole in the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is a disgrace when the town flagpole doesnt even have a flag on it. it should be compulsory to fly the national flag. Patriotism should be encouraged. It is not racist. This is Britain, we should show that we are proud of our country. Proud to be British
